name: Start Up
description:
WASD - Walk

LMB - Draw a marker

RMB - Erase the marker

Scroll Wheel - Change the active mark

Lead the robot through the level to finish! Each mark will make the robot move to it and do specific action.

 - Robot will go to this marker and stop

 - Robot will turn left/right and continue to move

 - Robot will turn around and continue to move  - If there is something, that robot can interact with nearby this mark, robot will go to this object and interact with it
